Women do go bald, just not in the same numbers as men.  As a matter of fact, the gene that shows the tendency for baldness is carried on the mother's side rather than the father's.  Also, there are more natural looking options for women with hair loss issues than there are for men.  Most women can find wigs that look far more natural than most men's toupees.
